name: Barry 's Fun adventure (test build)
description:
(nsfw content to be implemented)
A small little thing created in gb studio.  This isn't a full game yet,  just a small thing including a few of my characters, for an upcoming project that will allow you to control the main character barry, and get to know some of the locals.

Use the arrow keys to move and z to interact
leaving the area leads to an end screen which you'd have to reload to do anything more.
